Title: Torment From Beyond
Description:
As if it were not bad enough that N'Zoth seeks to dominate those living in the Vale, my scouts report they now seek to dominate the dead!

The Shado-Pan have their hands full defending the living. Can we rely on you to put an end to this disgrace?
ObjectivesText: Release 6 Ancient Pandaren Spirits in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
